actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to prevent the unreasonable detention of certain aliens with dependent children.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to limit the Attorney General's authority to detain an alien mother with a dependent child (two years or younger) subject to deportation (with specified exceptions) unless such detention is in connection with the alien's immediate departure from the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to prevent the unreasonable detention of certain aliens with dependent children.
